id: scenario-value-scanner-student-scenarios-individual-developing cooking skills as care economy capability
title: Developing cooking skills as care economy capability
description: Developing cooking skills as care economy capability
content:
Scenario: Developing cooking skills as care economy capability
    Given Kenji is learning to cook efficiently on tight budget
    And cooking is new skill he's developing as independent adult
    When the personal_agent teaches Kenji cooking techniques
    Then it should provide patient, practical instruction
    And it should teach him to plan meals that use ingredients efficiently
    And it should help him learn techniques that reduce prep time
    And the agent should recognize cooking as care economy skill
    And it should validate his progress: "You can now make 5 meals confidently"
    And Kenji should experience cooking as capability, not chore
